Published January 16 2015

The Phone Separation Anxiety Challenge

The Phone Separation Anxiety Challenge — Nellie Bowles, for Re/code, writing about the upcoming WNYC “Bored and Brilliant” project. They’ve partnered with Moment, an app that tracks the number of times you check your phone, and the event kicks off February 2.

Enjoy your day.
